actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an itemized deduction for motor vehicle insurance premiums.

summary.text: Revises the Internal Revenue Code to allow as a deduction from gross income a maximum of $150 paid by an individual during the taxable year as a premium on a motor vehicle insurance policy which insures a motor vehicle owned by the taxpayer.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an itemized deduction for motor vehicle insurance premiums.
